Description copied from interface: ServiceProvider
Creates a new user with the given login and password and inserts it into he database. If any of the parameters disallows the proper creation, an IncorrectParameterException is thrown. Returns the database's id (Long) of the newly created object.

login

public java.lang.Long login(java.lang.String login,
                            java.lang.String password,
                            java.lang.String ipAddress)
                     throws AuthenticationException
Description copied from interface: ServiceProvider
Loggs a certain user in, that is checks whether the login corresponds with the password and returns an id (Long) of the object in the User's database. If login/password mismatch occur, or login is not in the database, an AuthenticationException is thrown.

Specified by:
login in interface ServiceProvider
Returns:
Throws:
AuthenticationException

getRobots

public java.util.List<Robot> getRobots()
Description copied from interface: ServiceProvider
Returns a list of robots belonging to a user found in sessionConstants object of the session. If no sessionConstants object found, an InvalidSessionException is thrown

Specified by:

testRobots

public MatchReport testRobots(int leagueNumber,
                              java.util.List<java.lang.String> robotNames)
Description copied from interface: ServiceProvider
Arranges a test match between the given user's robots. It does not have any influence of user's / robot's scores. The results are later sent back to user as a MatchReport.

Specified by:
testRobots in interface ServiceProvider
